customAmountOptions.messageSingular: provides shelter, meals and care for 1 person

nickname: KATU Hope for the Holidays Telethon
customContent:
Give Hope for the Holidays!

Homelessness hurts, especially during the holidays. You can end the pain of homelessness and hunger. Give a hot, holiday meal to a hungry man, woman or child today!

Your gift today gives hope to so many people in our community, as well as the first steps to a second chance in life.

If your gift exceeds $24 a month or a $250 one time gift, you can receive one or more $20 gift cards to Fred Meyer! Be aware that the tax-deductible portion of your gift is reduced by the total face value of any gift cards you receive. Learn more about gift cards.
